EditTextPreference.android:title: Meal Time
EditTextPreference.android:summary: If you want this to adjust the weekly total hours, use the format such as 12pm-1pm or 12:30pm-1:30pm. All other formats will be ignored.

com.iammatt.colorpicker.colorPicker.Colo.android:summary: The color of this updated event. This only applies to google calendars.
com.iammatt.colorpicker.colorPicker.Colo.android:title: Event Color

Preference.android:title: Save Timeslot
Preference.android:summary: This must be clicked for the timeslot to be changed!
